Chelsey Gordon
==============

Phone: [214-559-9347](tel:2145599347)
  
[Email Chelsey](mailto:cgordon@hptx.org)

1. Town of Highland Park

1. 4700 Drexel Drive

1. Highland Park, Texas 75205

   **Hours of Operation**

   Town Hall:  
   Mon. - Fri. - 7:30 AM - 4:30 PM

   Library:  
   Tue. - 9:30 AM - 7:00 PM  
   Wed. - Sat. - 9:30 AM - 5:30 PM

   Highland Park DPS:  
   Mon. - Fri. 7:30 AM - 4:30 PM (Administration)

   Police/Fire/EMS Emergency & Non-Emergency Services:   
   24 hours a day, 7 days a week
